TopicTitle: [0.21]Lightweight Mun Return - Faraday Mk IX - 26.5T - 16parts - 4000lts Propellant

Articles.Content:
Good day, its been quite a while since SKRAM brought forth a new creation into the forums, but today I announce an updated craft, a new version of the Super lightweight Mun return craft - Faraday Mk IX.

Able to take a single KErbal to the Mun and back in a Mk1 Command pod, and have a touch of fuel remaining.

Simple Orbit instructions, should get you to orbit for about 4600DV.

Burn 100% at 90Hdg 90Pitch until you reach 300m/s

Tilt over to 90Hdg 40Pitch and hold until the stage is empty then MECO

This should give you a Suborbital with close to 70Kms high, level off to 70kms if too low.

A trip to the Mun and back should leave you with 200DV to spare if not more.

***

For the old version that worked way back in 0.14 and a little fuzzy trip down memory lane to see when 4-5*400lt tanks could get you to the Mun and back see here.
